name: Kanso
storyline:
A relaxing game of motion, pause, and flow.
Avoid obstacles while you trace around circular forms and find your moment of Zen.
Immerse into a colourfully ambient space, effortlessly glide through each world, and find your moment of Zen.
summary:
Kanso is a relaxing line following game of motion, pause, and flow.
Avoid obstacles while you trace around circular forms. Immerse into a colourfully ambient space, effortlessly glide through each of the worlds, and find your moment of Zen.
